<![CDATA[Accessing as teacher is possible to enable one user for time to stream webcam and talk. To enable a student select from the user list and click on icon located on bottom right on user list block.rn Students and Teacher can enable and disable microphone and webcam clicking on the play/stop icon located under the video.]]>
